titleStmt.title: The happinesse of practice. By Samuel VVard, Bachelour in Diuinity, and preacher of Ipswich
titleStmt.author: Ward, Samuel, 1577-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by George Purslowe] for Iohn Marriot, and Iohn Grismond, and are to be sold at their shops in Saint Dunstans Church-yard in Fleetstreet, and in Pauls Ally, at the signe of the Gunne,

notesStmt.note: In this edition A4r has catchword: Pepuza.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
